scripts.db:migrate: for f in packages/db/migrations/*.sql; do psql $DATABASE_URL -f $f; done
scripts.db:seed: for f in packages/db/seeds/*.sql; do psql $DATABASE_URL -f $f; done
scripts.test:mobile18: node -e "const v=+process.versions.node.split('.')[0]; if(v<18){console.error('Mobile tests require Node >= 18. Detected', process.versions.node); process.exit(1)}" && pnpm --filter mobile-app test
